content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the defendant 2 is responsible for paying a stamp duty and legal fees the court has awarded the applicant with various personal property items and the real property will be divided equally between the applicant and the defendant the text discusses articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property and obligations the applicant has applied for the dissolution of their marriage and requests the division of property acquired during the marriage the defendant has not filed a statement of defense and the case is being heard in their absence the court has established the marriage based on the marriage certificate and the parties have five adult children the court will decide on the division of their joint property the applicant requests that the real estate acquired during the marriage be divided equally between the spouses and that the movable property be awarded to the applicant the divorce is being declared and the defendant is ordered to pay a stamp duty and the costs of legal aid

metadata.cost: 120.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 203.76 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the defendant
